article.title: Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​

​Commercial Service Utah Staff Directory

9690 S. 300 W., Suite 201D
Sandy, UT 84070
Tel: 801/255-1871
Fax: 801/255-3147
Consultations by appointment, M-F. For driving directions to our office,click here.

David Fiscus, Director

Tel: (801) 255-1873
Fax: (801) 255-3147
Email:david.fiscus@trade.gov

Shelby Peterson, International Trade Specialist

Tel: (801) 255-1872
Fax: (801) 255-3147
Email:shelby.peterson@trade.gov

For information on internship opportunities, clickhere.

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 am – 6:00pm Eastern Time.
​

​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center.
